description: Marine Headquarters and the location of the Summit War, where the execution of Portgas D. Ace is taking place.

keyEvents.title: Little Oars Jr. Falls at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Little Oars Jr. collapses after being defeated by the combined forces of the Warlords, his massive body creating destruction across the bay.
keyEvents.significance: Marks a major loss for the Whitebeard Pirates and demonstrates the power of the assembled Warlords.

keyEvents.title: Marine Deserter Executed by Akainu
keyEvents.description: Akainu executes a Marine soldier attempting to desert the battlefield, establishing the brutal nature of Absolute Justice.
keyEvents.significance: First clear death scene in the present timeline, showing the cost of war on all sides.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Arrives at Marineford from the Sky
keyEvents.description: A battleship carrying Luffy and escaped Impel Down prisoners falls from the sky into Marineford Bay, dramatically shifting the battle's dynamics.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the arrival of a third major force at the war and sets up the climactic moments of the Marineford Arc.
